remarks: Existence of positive reciprocal of positive real number.  Axiom for real and complex numbers, derived from set theory.  This construction-dependent theorem should not be referenced directly; instead, use ~ ax-precex . In treatments which assume excluded middle, the ` 0 <RR A ` condition is generally replaced by ` A =/= 0 ` , and it may not be necessary to state that the reciproacal is positive.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 6-Feb-2020.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
axprecex $p |- ( ( A e. RR /\ 0 <RR A ) -> E. x e. RR ( 0 <RR x /\ ( A x. x ) = 1 ) ) $.
$d A x $.
